data.comment: The match is underway in Toluca.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in the half of Toluca.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Throw-in for Toluca in their own half.
Toluca have a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Toluca.
Toluca pushes forward through Alan Medina, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Toluca close to the penalty box.
In the minute 10, In Toluca a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Toluca drives forward and Michael Estrada gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Guadalajara's Isaac Brizuela breaks free at Estadio Nemesio Diez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 13, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Toluca a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toluca's half?
In the minute 15, Guadalajara's Jose Macias misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Toluca goal kick.
Throw-in Guadalajara.
In the minute 16, Gaston Sauro is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Toluca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Brandon Sartiaguin (Toluca) has replaced the possibly injured Gaston Sauro.
Toluca have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Guadalajara throw-in in Toluca's half.
In the minute 25, Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Toluca close to the penalty box.
Free kick Guadalajara.
In the minute 28, Toluca push forward at Estadio Nemesio Diez and William da Silva gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Guadalajara defence.
Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Jose Macias of Guadalajara gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 30, Toluca have a goal kick.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Guadalajara's Jose Macias gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 35, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Toluca a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
In the minute 39, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Toluca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Javier Guemez.
In the minute 42, Toluca's Javier Guemez is back in action after a slight knock.
Can Guadalajara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toluca's half?
Free kick for Guadalajara in the half of Toluca.
In the minute 45, Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Throw-in Toluca.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Toluca.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Toluca in their own half.
In the minute 51, In Toluca, Jose Macias of Guadalajara is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
In the minute 53, Guadalajara are pushing forward but Jose Macias's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
In Toluca a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 54, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava waits before resuming play because Jesus Sanchez for Guadalajara is still down.
Adrian Mora (Toluca) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Jesus Sanchez is back on his feet again.
In the minute 56, Rubens Sambueza of Toluca smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Toluca.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
In the minute 57, Guadalajara to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
Free kick Guadalajara.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, Throw-in high up the field for Toluca in Toluca.
Can Toluca capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Diego Gonzalez heads in to make it 1-0 at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 60, Rubens Sambueza with an assist there.
Guadalajara are in shooting range from this free kick.
Rubens Sambueza (Toluca) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 65, Guadalajara to take a throw-in in Toluca territory.
Diego Abella is on a sub for Michael Estrada for Toluca.
Jose Manuel De la Torre is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Nemesio Diez with Kevin Castaneda replacing Alan Medina.
In the minute 66, Cristian Calderon is replacing Miguel Ponce for the away team.
Eduardo Lopez is replacing Ronaldo Cisneros for Guadalajara at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
Toluca have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Isaac Brizuela gets his shot on target but fails to score for Guadalajara.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Toluca will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Guadalajara.
William da Silva for Toluca has been booked by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava and receives a first yellow card.
Guadalajara are coming forward and Eduardo Lopez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 70, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Toluca a goal kick.
Guadalajara's Cristian Calderon misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Toluca at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
In the minute 72, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the away team a throw-in.
In Toluca Toluca attack through William da Silva. The finish is off target, however.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Jose Macias for Guadalajara drives towards goal at Estadio Nemesio Diez. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Adrian Mora (Toluca) has received a yellow card from Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 76, Free kick in a good position for Guadalajara!
Guadalajara drive upfield and Eduardo Lopez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Toluca defender.
In the minute 77, Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Victor Vucetich (Guadalajara) is making a third substitution, with Jose Maduena replacing Fernando Beltran.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Free kick for Toluca in their own half.
Throw-in for Toluca in the half of Guadalajara.
In the minute 82, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Guadalajara throw-in in Toluca's half.
Guadalajara's Isaac Brizuela is on target but unsuccessful.
In Toluca Guadalajara's Jose Macias is caught offside.
In the minute 84, Toluca make their fourth substitution with Antonio Rios replacing William da Silva.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
The home team replace Enrique Triverio with Carlos Cisneros.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Guadalajara in their own half.
Free kick for Toluca in the half of Guadalajara.
Throw-in Guadalajara.
In the minute 89, Guadalajara's Jesus Molina has been booked in Toluca.
The away team have replaced Jesus Molina with Sebastian Martinez. This is the fourth substitution made today by Victor Vucetich.
Guadalajara have a dangerous throw-in.
Guadalajara's Jesus Sanchez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Toluca defender.
Toluca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Nemesio Diez.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Jose Macias (Guadalajara) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Guadalajara are pushing forward but Jose Macias's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toluca.
That's full-time at Estadio Nemesio Diez. The final score is 1-0.
At Estadio Nemesio Diez, Hiram Mier has been yellow-carded for the away team.
